The post: s Thai-language caption translates to English, stating that America discovered a vaccine that can cure COVID-19 within three hours.
Inovio: s president and CEO, Dr. J. Joseph Kim, stated that they designed their DNA vaccine INO-4800 in three hours after the publication of the genetic sequence of the novel coronavirus. However, the statement also mentions that human clinical trials will begin in April 2020 and trial results will be released in late 2020, indicating that the vaccine is still in the development phase.
